name: Grafana
description: Analytics and interactive visualization platform. Beautiful dashboards for metrics.
author: StumpfWorks
compose:
version: '3.8'

services:
  grafana:
    image: grafana/grafana:latest
    container_name: grafana
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "{{PORT}}:3000"
    environment:
      - GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD={{GF_SECURITY_ADMIN_PASSWORD}}
      - GF_INSTALL_PLUGINS={{GF_INSTALL_PLUGINS}}
      - GF_SERVER_ROOT_URL=http://localhost:{{PORT}}
    volumes:
      - {{DATA_PATH}}:/var/lib/grafana
    user: "472"
    labels:
      - "com.stumpfworks.app=grafana"
      - "com.stumpfworks.category=monitoring"

notes: Change admin password on first login
Add data sources like Prometheus, InfluxDB, etc.
